message: Let's make a deal, Bob. I take $70, you take $30. It's in your best interest to agree as the money will be worth less with every round.
Alice, your offer was a bit too greedy for me. Let's be reasonable. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor.  This accounts for the time-value of the money, as it will be worth less in future rounds.
Bob, time is money! It's better for both of us to settle this quickly. I'll take $65, you take $35. This is my final offer.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. You're playing chicken with the value of our money. I'm proposing a 50/50 split to end this now before we both lose out even more.
